answerText: The Inheritors[10] This author of The Inheritors wrote about Matty's upbringing in post-World War Two England in Darkness Visible and also penned a trilogy about Edmund Talbot called To the Ends of the Earth.
heading: Missiles of October |2011 | 12 | 19 | Literature | British | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: The main characters in this novel believe in an earth goddess named Oa, and they are devastated when a log bridge across a river collapses.  For 10 points each: [10] Name this novel in which Lok and Ma attempt to search for the so-called "young ones," who are two babies from their tribe.
